areas.name: mon_mitm
areas.description: Overlay scanner (MITM) for detecting spawnpoints. Raids will also get detected

settings.description: Name of area
Set this open true, if you scan the area for gyms / spawnpoints the first time
Path to including geofence for scanarea
Path to excluding geofence for scanarea
Name of routefile
Scan all spawnpoints or just ones with unknwon endtimes
Speed of player in kmh
Max. distance of walking - otherwise teleport to new location
Offset to be added to events such as spawns or raid starts. E.g. if you want to scan gyms at least a minute after an egg has hatched, set it to 60 (Default: 0)
Cluster events within the given timedelta in seconds. The latest event in time within a timedelta will be used to scan the clustered events (Default: 0)
Remove any events in priority queue that have been due for scanning before NOW - given time in seconds (Default: 0)
Disable round-robin of route vs. priority queue events. If true,  your route may not be completed in time and e.g. only spawns will be scanned
Rounds in Init Mode. (Default: 1)
Name of area
Set this open true, if you scan the area for gyms / spawnpoints the first time
Path to including geofence for scanarea
Path to excluding geofence for scanarea
Name of routefile
Speed of player in kmh
Max. distance of walking - otherwise teleport to new location
Offset to be added to events such as spawns or raid starts. E.g. if you want to scan gyms at least a minute after an egg has hatched, set it to 60 (Default: 0)
Cluster events within the given timedelta in seconds. The latest event in time within a timedelta will be used to scan the clustered events (Default: 0)
Remove any events in priority queue that have been due for scanning before NOW - given time in seconds (Default: 0)
Disable round-robin of route vs. priority queue events. If true,  your route may not be completed in time and e.g. only spawns will be scanned
Rounds in Init Mode. (Default: 1)
Name of area
Path to including geofence for scanarea
Path to excluding geofence for scanarea
Name of routefile
Speed of player in kmh
Max. distance of walking - otherwise teleport to new location
Offset to be added to events such as spawns or raid starts. E.g. if you want to scan gyms at least a minute after an egg has hatched, set it to 60 (Default: 0)
Cluster events within the given timedelta in seconds. The latest event in time within a timedelta will be used to scan the clustered events (Default: 0)
Remove any events in priority queue that have been due for scanning before NOW - given time in seconds (Default: 0)
Disable round-robin of route vs. priority queue events. If true,  your route may not be completed in time and e.g. only spawns will be scanned
Name of device (from RGC settings)
Area of daytime_area
Area of nighttime_area
Delay in seconds after reaching destination with the speed given. (Default: 2.0)
Delay in seconds after a teleport. (Default: 4.0)
Walk n seconds after teleport for getting data
More cooldown after teleport
Delay in seconds after a screenshot has been taken and about to be saved. (Default: 0.2)
Delay in seconds to wait after starting pogo. (Default: 60.0)
Restart Pogo every N location-changes. (Default: 80. - 0 for never)
Delay in minutes to wait before moving to the location of a hatched egg. Raidbosses do not necessarily appear immediately. (Default: 3.5)
Timeout for waiting for data after setting/reaching a location. (Default: 45)
Reaching wait-for-data timout n times for restart Pogo. (Default: 60)
Username of device
Password of devic
